channel.title: Help Need - 474 Server / Run Issues
channel.description:
Hello, I am currently having issues with my 474 Private Server. I just recently downloaded the frame/base from 'arham 4'. It is called World 901. I have the World 901 Client folder, as well as the World 901 Server folder. I have experience with creating / building rsps's. With this one I cannot find out how to run the server, or in other words play the game. I cannot find any server-ip in the client.java file. I am just really struggling with getting the server to run / be playable to just me. I have yet to even get the game to load up. Somebody please help me :). I would put screenshots in but I don't know how lol.
-TheyCallMeNitro :cool:

item.title: Help Need - 474 Server / Run Issues
item.dc:creator: @TheyCallMeNitro TheyCallMeNitro
item.description:
@TheyCallMeNitro wrote:

Hello,
I am currently having issues with my 474 Private Server. I just recently downloaded the frame/base from ‘arham 4’. It is called World 901. I have the World 901 Client folder, as well as the World 901 Server folder. I have experience with creating / building rsps’s. With this one I cannot find out how to run the server, or in other words play the game. I cannot find any server-ip in the client.java file. I am just really struggling with getting the server to run / be playable to just me. I have yet to even get the game to load up. Somebody please help me :). I would put screenshots in but I don’t know how lol.

-TheyCallMeNitro
